title: Google Doodle celebrates Route 66, a touchstone of American car culture
content:
The latest Google Doodle celebrates the anniversary of the creation of Route 66, the famous highway that ran from Chicago to Los Angeles and serves as a historical touchstone in American car culture.

description: Google Doodle celebrates Route 66, the highway from Chicago to Los Angeles that serves as a historical touchstone into American culture.
